title: Can Riot Bring Back Honor Alerts To Beta Client???
body:
**Lately, I've been reforming after a chat ban in order to get a badge and a PBE account.**

**Part of my reform process was being nice to people and having them honor me so I can get a badge.**

**Ever since I've updated to the new client, I do not know if I have been honored because there are no alerts that show up like in the old client after a game if you get honored or not.**

**Can you please add these back so I can track my honors and feel accomplished when I get honors but also get to see the cool sexy new client???**

-----------------------------------------------------


**Thanks, Rito!**{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: upped for justice! bring back honor initiative for new client!

Well, it's not like they were *removed* from the Beta Client rather they simply haven't been added yet. I'm not sure if these are planned to be in the final version of the new client, but you can always keep up with the new client on the [**Client Discussion Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I do have another actually.


Can I get a PBE account? I've been signing up for like a year now and I'm very commended and nice.

I also have a post where i helped people fix client and it has almost 10k views if that means anything.

We cannot manually review PBE applications, but I do wish you the best of luck with your application, friend.

It's cool to take the initiative to help others, but those actions don't directly affect your eligibility for PBE Access.
